data.text: Flights departing from Hong Kong International Airport this evening are cancelled until early morning on Tuesday 13 August. Check-in and immigration services are suspended. 1/2
As a result, our flights to and from Hong Kong will be affected. For special ticketing guides and the latest flight status, Please check https://t.co/mkS9F33e4u . We thank you for your understanding.

data.text: Our flights to and from Hong Kong are operating as normal. Please allow sufficient time for travelling to the airport. For info please check https://t.co/bWmY9zNuuO for latest flight status.

In line with standard practice and to protect our customers and staff, there are CCTV cameras installed in our airport lounges and onboard aircraft (one camera, positioned near the cockpit door) for security purposes. All images are handled sensitively with strict access controls
Regarding recent media reports, we would like to clarify that our inflight entertainment systems do not have any cameras, microphones or sensors to monitor passengers, nor have they in the past.

data.text:
🛑 #倫敦 #希斯路 #LHR （香港時間 8月3日 19:30）

希斯路機場旗下員工於8月5及6日採取工業行動。因此8月5日CX251及8月6日CX252航班將改為使用倫敦格域機場升降並根據新時間表運作。其他往來倫敦航班不受影響，但希斯路機場當日預計極度擁擠。請乘客預留最少4小時前到達機場。如需協助，請細信我們。

data.text:
🗣 #倫敦 #希斯路 #LHR (香港時間7月24日20:00)

希斯路機場剛對外宣布，原訂於本週末（7月26及27日）的罷工行動現已暫停。國泰航空當日來往 #倫敦 #希斯路 的航班將如常運作。僅此感謝乘客的支持和體諒。 🙇‍♂️🙇‍♀️

entity.name: Planned Heathrow Airport strikes have been suspended
entity.description: Heathrow Airport workers have postponed strikes that were scheduled for Friday 26 and Saturday 27 July. data.text:
🛑 #倫敦 #希斯路 #LHR （香港時間 7月24日 03:30）

希斯路機場正式宣布旗下員工，包括部份安檢職員將於7月26日及27日罷工。國泰航空將竭力維持該兩日航班的正常運作。當局預料該機場於罷工期間將會非常擁堵。避免你的行程受阻，請於航班起飛前4小時抵達機場。更多資訊 👇 https://t.co/XJQr25DOYn
